column4: Hi, changed everything "breezy" to "dapper" in sources.list, after an update there where just 6 packages to upgrade. Is dapper still the same as breezy and time needed to get bleeding edge in?
Dapper is the next release, perhaps sometime in April of next year, and considering Breezy was just released like a week and half ago, yeah, you might be jumping the gun
bur[n] er: can't be. havnt seen anything like that. is it enough replacing dapper with breezy or is there more?
HappyFool, well I like bleeding edge :)
